name: AstroManic
description:
In this 2D Platformer, you are an astronaut tasked with getting to the top of a ship whilst steering your vessel to avoid asteroids.  On the right of the screen you will see your ship, on the left will be the main display. Jumping is the main form of moving. If an asteroid hits your ship on the right,  prepare to move your astronaut!

Ps -  Alt+f4 to exit
